subject: Line Separators Error is getting while testing the Junit TestCases
msgSnippet: Hi, I am new to the junit test cases.please clearify me doubts. I am getting line separators error in my test cases.We are using axis,hibernate and junit.In
messageBody:
Hi,
I am new to the junit test cases.please clearify me doubts.

I am getting line separators error in my test cases.We are
using axis,hibernate and junit.In this project I am passing 2 xml data
as strings and I am testing assertEquals().In this I am getting error
as everything is correct only lineseparators.please help me in
avoiding this error.

Thanks & Regards,
Thanuja
